algorithm_technique: Greedy approach by adding positive differences between consecutive elements
problem_summary_simple: Find the maximum alternating sum of a subsequence.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily selects elements to maximize the sum, effectively adding positive differences between adjacent elements in the original array.
key_insights: The problem can be viewed as picking peaks and valleys to maximize the sum (peak - valley + peak - valley ...).
It's optimal to include an element if it increases the current alternating sum.
This can be achieved by summing up all positive differences between adjacent elements and adding the first element.
